text: Badajoz () is the capital of the Badajoz Province in the autonomous community of Extremadura, Spain. The population in 2011 was 151,565. A major Napoleonic siege was fought here between Britain and France == Town twinning == * Elvas, Portugal * Santarém, Portugal * Nazaré, Portugal * Blumenau, Brazil * Granada, Nicaragua ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Province of Badajoz Category:Municipalities in Extremadura Category:Capital cities in Spain
title: Badajoz
